summary: Defines abstract and concrete style classes for rendering horizontal sections in the MSS web map service. The abstract base supplies common utilities such as color‑bar handling and section drawing, while the Matplotlib‑Basemap implementation configures map projections, draws basemap backgrounds, generates graticules, applies data masks, and performs coordinate transformations for visualising geophysical data.
business_intent: Enable consistent, configurable visualisation of atmospheric or geophysical horizontal slices within a web‑map service, leveraging Matplotlib and Basemap to produce map‑projected images with proper styling, colour scales, and geographic overlays.
